name: Casadastra
description:
What is Casadastra?

  • Casadastra is a homage to the ancient tradition of game mazes.
  • Casadastra is an abstract autobiographical artifact.
  • Casadastra is an experiment in removing impairment-induced doubt.
  • Casadastra is an attempt to compress exact places into digital essence.
  • Casadastra is a three year fridge-stored soup.

Explain yourself:

EXPLICITLY:
Casadastra is a game about navigating mazes first with sight, and then blind. Through the action of mapping the space, the player enters a virtual trust-fall with the game. In truth, I'm bad at trust falling. Maybe I made this game so I could trust fall with my laptop in a way that didn't involve crushing it... Casadastra contains 7 areas, as well as objects to interact with - sometimes they speak. 

ALSO, QUIETLY:
Casadastra is a game about an event that changed my trajectory as a human person. It's also about night walking, my home town, powerlines, the complicated feeling of a place, wetness and dryness in relation to brain-space, the textural relationship between red-brown and the deep night sky,  gesturing in complicated ways at myself, gesturing in simple ways at people I know,  gesturing with varying intentions towards the player, showing off all the things I can do on my laptop, my aspirations towards the future of video-games...

It's texture, really.  All texture - spiralling, moving - the texture of space and of time, looking back, trying to look forward, where I've stood, where I might stand again... It's also just about a video game. I hope you will enjoy this thing I've put together.

Features:

  • Warm, frightening, cold, homely, harsh atmosphere
  • Non-combat dungeon-crawler-style tile-based exploration
  • Pen & Paper mapping encouragement
  • Truly cryptic dialogue perpetrated by vague, warped spectres
  • Hazy boardwalks, silent offices, flooding houses, multiple buzzing frequencies
  • Original music and field recording by Earth Treader Fen
  • A slow, mysterious pace
  • Verdant imprints of the real earth

Mantra-like, Casadastra

Versions:

Soundtrack: https://earthtreaderfen.bandcamp.com/album/casadastra-sound (NOT YET RELEASED)

What is the difference between Local and Linked Versions?
When you purchase the Upwards Warping Edition, you get access to both Local and Linked variants.Local contains, within the download, all bonus content. 
If the 5gb file-size of that download is unreasonable to download due to your circumstances,  Linked supplies links to online versions of all bonus content, which you can view online as you please, or download piecemeal.

Casadastra Releases 31/01/2021
